origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'OPECPlus.get_latest_decision', 'description': 'Get the latest decision made by OPEC+ regarding oil production cuts.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'organization', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the organization, e.g., OPEC+.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'decision', 'description': 'A dictionary containing details about the latest production cut decision.'}]}, {'name': 'GlobalInvestment.get_policy_changes', 'description': 'Get the latest investment policy changes in major countries.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'country', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the country, e.g., USA, China.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policy_changes', 'description': 'A dictionary containing details about the latest investment policy changes in the specified country.'}]}, {'name': 'GlobalInvestment.analyze_impact', 'description': 'Analyze the impact of OPEC+ production cuts on global investment policies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'decision', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The decision made by OPEC+ regarding oil production cuts.'}, {'name': 'policy_changes', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The latest investment policy changes in major countries.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the analysis of the impact of OPEC+ production cuts on global investment policies.'}]}, {'name': 'GlobalInvestment.evaluate_policy_impact', 'description': 'Evaluate the impact of OPEC+ production cuts on global investment policies based on the analysis.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The analysis of the impact of OPEC+ production cuts on global investment policies.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policy_impact_evaluation', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the evaluation of the impact of OPEC+ production cuts on global investment policies.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
获取欧佩克+组织最近一次减产决定的详细信息。接下来，获取美国和中国最新的投资政策变化数据。然后，分析这些数据以确定减产对投资政策的影响。最后，提供基于这些分析的投资政策影响评估。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取欧佩克+组织最近一次减产决定的详细信息。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'organization'的值是什么?
